column4: I just want to know how to use a dockbar once you have installed it
once you install dockbar how do you begin using it???
once you install dockbar how do you begin using it???
please anyone correct me if I'm wrong
once you install dockbar how do you begin using it???
does anyone know how to start using eyecandy/themes once you have installed them?
also most 'theme' stuff is actually theme PARTS you access/select via the customize button/settings in the theme tool
for gnome its the 'appearance' menu item in the system/prefs menu
this is what I'm trying to install http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/DockbarX?content=101604
thats not a theme  and there are repos for that program.
check out the dockbarx homepage and look for  'ppa' repositories for it.
I did use the ppa repos
now how do I use the dock bar?
then you update/install the tool and its in the add to panel... menu items under the gnome panel settings.
same as you add anything else to the panels
